definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Modify your diet to exclude or limit dairy products, alcohol, smoking or other stimulants.
sentences.chinese: 不喫或少喫乳製品，儘量不要接近菸酒或其他刺激物。

sentences.english: For biological products, samples from several consecutively manufactured batches should be submitted.
sentences.chinese: 對於生物製品，應當要提交連續幾個生產批次的樣品。

sentences.english: He also created a functioning replica of MySpace's log-in page.
sentences.chinese: 斯克姆還創建了MySpace的登陸網頁的複製品。

sentences.english: To introduce foundation and development course of China Steel Wire Products Info Assn.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了全國金屬製品信息網的創建與發展歷程。

sentences.english: The products made from the two appropriative resins show excellent comprehensive performance.
sentences.chinese: 由該專用樹脂製得的製品具有優良的綜合性能。

sentences.english: SJL daub can be used to repair cement or concrete products for their outlook defects.
sentences.chinese: SJL膠泥可用於修補混凝土與水泥製品的外觀缺陷。

sentences.english: Such as Chen Xinzhong organization are "non-cotton products" of the new school.
sentences.chinese: 比如陳新忠所在公司就屬於“非棉製品”的新一派。

sentences.english: Shanghai Linjie Plastics Products Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 上海林傑橡塑製品有限公司。

sentences.english: For clear skin, stay away from dairy.
sentences.chinese: 爲了擁有乾淨清透的皮膚，遠離奶製品。

sentences.english: The compressive strength and porosity of the product are measured.
sentences.chinese: 對製品進行抗壓強度和氣孔率的測試觀察。

sentences.english: The products made of well-selected wool feel soft (have a soft feel).
sentences.chinese: 用料上乘的羊毛製品，手感柔軟。

sentences.english: We can source lamination stampings for you, or build using yours provided to us on consignment.
sentences.chinese: 我們可提供您衝壓製品或根據您提供的情況進行設計。

sentences.english: One was a print of a Red Indian, given him, he told me, by Catlin;
sentences.chinese: 一件是北美印第安人的花布製品，他說是卡特林送的。

sentences.english: Our company specializes in producing all kinds of complex color printing packaging products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司專業生產各種複合彩印包裝製品。

sentences.english: Stabilized body care products, household products, textiles and fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 穩定的身體護理品，家用製品，紡織品和織物。

sentences.english: It produces less waste than their paper alternatives and they aren’t nearly as inconvenient as you might think.
sentences.chinese: 它們比紙製品產生更少的浪費並且比你所想象的方便。

definition: to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
to choose for some purpose/to select and use
dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
